readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.2/f Abigail 1000/w rainy/t 1200 1900/z w: AbigailFlute/-1000 -1000/farmer 34 32 1 Abigail 47 31 2/skippable/ambientLight 160 140 10/specificTemporarySprite abbyAtLake/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/viewport 46 31 true/pause 17900/move farmer 13 0 0/stopMusic/playMusic rain/pause 500/stopAnimation Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote Abigail 16/speak Abigail "$q 32 null#@！你怎麼站在雨裡啊？$7#$r 32 0 Event_Rain_1#我在幹活#$r 32 50 Event_Rain_2#我在享受這種天氣#$r 32 10 Event_Rain_3#我還想問你呢"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1250/speak Abigail "我想一個人在這兒靜靜。$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1600/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "你陪我也好！"/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/speak Abigail "你都淋透了...來，站到樹底下。"/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 2/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 3000/speak Abigail "看著雨簾在寂靜的湖面上飄蕩...這種感覺難以形容。$8"/pause 650/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 600/playSound dwop/showFrame 98/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 16/pause 800/speak Abigail "嘿！迷你豎琴！$h#$b#你身上到處充滿驚喜，@。我很驚訝。"/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 900/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 700/faceDirection Abigail 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/showFrame Abigail 16/pause 500/showFrame 98/pause 2000/playMusic AbigailFluteDuet/pause 1250/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/animate farmer false true 308 99 98 98 99 100 100/pause 10000/viewport move 1 0 18000/pause 20000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/end
content.8/f Maru 1500/w sunny/t 2100 2340: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 29 3 Maru 14 29 3/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 23 true/pause 2000/playSound leafrustle/pause 200/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 400/emote Maru 8/pause 800/move farmer -5 0 3/speak Maru "@！沒想到這麼晚，還能在這兒遇到你。"/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 1000/speak Maru "這會兒的夜空好美啊。"/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "來，我想給你看樣兒東西。"/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Maru "來，瞧一眼。"/move Maru 0 1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 200/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 1200/playMusic spaceMusic/speak Maru "$q 40 null#你看到的是什麼？#$r 40 30 Event_Space1#一顆美麗的星球。#$r 40 -30 Event_Space2#一片漆黑的深淵。"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "等人們能夠登上這些星星的時候，你我早就不在人世了...$8"/emote farmer 28/pause 400/speak Maru "我想這就是身為人類所不好的一點，對不對？"/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1200/faceDirection Maru 2/emote Maru 40/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 0/speak Maru "@，呃...$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1500/speak Maru "算了...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 800/speak Maru "來，我給你指雙子星系..."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3 true/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite maruTelescope/viewport move 0 -1 16000/pause 16000/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "真是好美的夜晚啊！瑪魯讓我見識了一些新東西..."/pause 1000 /stopAnimation farmer/changeLocation Mountain/end
content.26/f Linus 1000/w sunny/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 18 8 1 Linus 29 8 2/specificTemporarySprite linusCampfire/viewport 29 7 clamp true/move farmer 8 0 1/faceDirection Linus 3/emote Linus 32/speak Linus "@！過來烤火哇。感覺很棒呢。"/pause 400/move farmer 2 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/move Linus 1 0 2/move Linus 0 1 3/pause 1500/speak Linus "我一直希望你能過來找我。"/pause 500/emote Linus 28/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 2/pause 500/showFrame Linus 19/pause 500/speak Linus "我想為一開始對你的懷疑道歉。$s#$b#大多數人對我都不好，所以我就變得特別敏感。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Linus 0/faceDirection Linus 3/speak Linus "但你對我真的很好。你是個非常特別的人。$h#$b#我把你當作好朋友。"/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 3/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Linus 3/move Linus 0 -1 3/move Linus -1 0 0/speak Linus "嘿，我想給你看件東西，進來。$h"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move Linus 0 -1 0/playSound grassyStep/warp Linus -10 -10/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound grassyStep/warp farmer -10 -10/playMusic none/pause 1500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/playSound dirtyHit/pause 1200/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 600/playSound slimedead/pause 1000/speak Linus "瞧，你看見了嗎？這是一種我特製的魚餌。#$b#這是最頂級的貨色...連我自己都想吃！#$b#給，這是我的配方。"/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 29 7/playSound grassyStep/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 1000/showFrame 84/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Wild Bait/message "學會製作「萬能魚餌」"/pause 900/end
content.BadAnswer: speak Maru "$q 18982 null#你會那麼說，肯定有原因...$a#$r 18982 50 event_robot_explain1#瑪麗爾達就是一台設計用來模仿人類的機器。#$r 18982 50 event_robot_explain2#我剛才是在開玩笑，瑪麗爾達應該享有自由的權力。#$r 18982 -50 event_robot_explain3#我會讓她去農場裡工作。"/faceDirection Maru 1/emote Maru 12/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "好啦，我該走了。感謝你今天陪我，@。$8"/globalFade/viewport -3000 -3000/changeLocation ScienceHouse/end
content.384883/f Sebastian 1000/t 1100 1700: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 27 1 Sebastian 18 26 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianGarage/showFrame Sebastian 33/animate Sebastian false true 100 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36 36/positionOffset Sebastian 24 16/viewport 18 25 true/move farmer 5 0 0/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 100/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 800/stopAnimation Sebastian/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 500/speak Sebastian "哦，你好啊，@。$8"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak Sebastian "什麼，你還沒有見識過我的摩托車？唔...可能是我沒有給你看過。$8"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 32/animate Sebastian false false 100 35 34 33 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/animate Sebastian false true 200 32 32 32 36 32 32 36 36 36/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 300/pause 800/playSound parry/pause 800/playSound clank/playMusic echos/pause 2000/glow 80 70 255 true/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "有時候，在太陽下山以後，我就會騎著它，開出星露谷好遠...$8"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "順著空曠的公路，向著城裡微弱的燈光，一路狂飆，這個感覺無與倫比...$9"/pause 200/playSound clank/pause 500/playSound clank/pause 200/speak Sebastian "等我存夠了錢，就要一個人出去闖蕩...我要和我的摩托，去比城裡還遠的地方。就只有我和我的摩托車。$9"/pause 900/playSound clank/pause 900/stopAnimation Sebastian/playSound Milking/pause 1500/stopGlowing/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Sebastian "好了，油已經換過了。$8"/pause 1200/showFrame Sebastian 35/animate Sebastian false false 100 32 33 34 35/playSound dwoop/pause 1900/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#嘿...如果你想騎的話，我或許可以讓你騎一下。$8^嘿...或許我能找個時間帶你兜兜風。$8#$r -1 10 event_garage1#聽起來很有趣。#$r -1 -10 event_garage2#不用了，謝謝。我覺得不怎麼樣。#$r -1 0 event_garage3#我很怕摩托車。"/pause 900/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 4000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.384882/f Sebastian 2500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 18 35 0 Sebastian -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianOnBike/viewport 17 28/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@。我正要出發呢。#$b#上來...我想給你看樣東西。"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 1 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianRide/ambientLight 0 0 0/specificTemporarySprite sebastianRide/viewport 15 8 true/pause 8000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianMountain/ambientLight 0 0 0/warp farmer 15 18/warp Sebastian 16 18/positionOffset farmer 0 16/playMusic spaceMusic/viewport 15 14 true/pause 10000/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "遠處就是祖祖城..."/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "當我想要逃避一切的時候，就會來到這裡，一個人...靜靜。"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 600/animate Sebastian false true 110 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 21 22 23 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1800/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Sebastian "$q -1 null#那麼，你覺得怎麼樣？#$r -1 0 event_city1#好美啊。#$r -1 10 event_city2#這讓我有一種莫名的傷感。#$r -1 -10 event_city3#有點兒醜。#$r -1 0 event_city4#你該戒煙了。"/stopAnimation Sebastian/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 3000/speak Sebastian "曾經，我對城裡的生活很是著迷...但現在我覺得，在這山谷的老家裡，我會更加快樂。"/pause 500/pause 900/speak Sebastian "@...？$s#$b#呃...我從來沒對...別人有過這種感覺...但你與眾不同。$l^我很少帶女孩子來這裡...其實，你是唯一一個。$l#$b#你知道我想說什麼，對不對？$l"/pause 700/faceDirection farmer content.404798/Hn ccFishTank: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 42 11 0 Willy 47 7 0/specificTemporarySprite dickBag/viewport 47 5 clamp true/emote Willy 8/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 500/speak Willy "嗨，@。"/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 0/speak Willy "好奇怪...我不知道這塊兒圓石是怎麼消失的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Willy "這條小溪的源頭在深山裡面。"/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite dickGlitter/playSound slosh/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/jump Willy/pause 800/emote Willy 16/speak Willy "嘿！你看到水裡那個閃閃發亮的東西了嗎？"/pause 800/showFrame Willy 24/pause 250/showFrame Willy 25/pause 1000/speak Willy "對...那是塊優質礦石！$h"/showFrame Willy 24/pause 200/showFrame Willy 0/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "肯定是水流把它從山裡帶出來的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Willy "你知道這意味著什麼嗎？"/pause 900/jump Willy/pause 800/speak Willy "這意味著我們可以開始淘礦石了！$h"/faceDirection Willy 2/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "給，我的背包裡還有一個淘盤...你就用這個吧？"/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 1/pause 800/showFrame Willy 26/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 500/showFrame Willy 4/pause 500/showFrame Willy 12/faceDirection Willy 3/awardFestivalPrize Pan/null/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 2/speak Willy "只要在水裡見到發光的礦石，就用淘盤撈上來看看。"/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead pan/null/pause 1000/end
content.371652/f Linus 2000/w sunny/t 600 1700/a: sweet/18 32/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Robin -1000 -1000 2 Linus 23 33 1/animate Linus false true 250 20 21/pause 3000/doAction 24 33/pause 500/doAction 24 33/pause 800/doAction 24 33/pause 1000/stopAnimation Linus/move Linus -2 0 0/move Linus 0 -1 1/animate Linus false true 250 20 21/pause 500/doAction 22 32/pause 900/doAction 22 32/pause 200/doAction 22 32/pause 1200/stopAnimation Linus/move Linus -6 0 0/move Linus 0 -5 0 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000/move false/move Linus -2 0 3/warp Robin 12 26/playSound doorClose/pause 400/showFrame Robin 19/textAboveHead Robin "Eep！"/shake Robin 500/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 0/showFrame Robin 0/pause 1 500/warp farmer 11 26/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Linus 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1000/speak Robin "哦...是萊納斯，對吧？$s"/emote Robin 40/speak Robin "你餓了嗎？我可以為你做午飯...剩下的洞穴胡蘿蔔湯怎麼樣？"/pause 500/speak Linus "你真好，但是不用了，謝謝！我今天找東西吃的運氣很好。$h"/pause 1000/speak Robin "嘿...好吧。$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/speak Robin "@？你看起來像有話要說..."/pause 500/question fork0 "#我只是想說萊納斯幹得不錯，這讓我很高興...#我想邀請萊納斯和我一起住在農場裡..."/pause 100/fork linusWell/faceDirection Robin 2 true/textAboveHead Robin "哇！"/showFrame Linus 22/jump Linus/pause 2000/showFrame Linus 0/pause 1000/showFrame Linus 0/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "這麼慷慨！真是個好主意！我可以為你建造一間舒適的真房子，萊納斯。$h"/move Robin 0 1 1/speak Robin "你終於要有自來水、暖氣、屋頂了...就像我們其他人一樣！是不是很棒，萊納斯？"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 1000/showFrame Linus 19/pause 1000/speak Linus "呃...$s#$b#嗯...不用了，謝謝。$s"/playSound thudStep/showFrame Robin 19/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/pause 40/positionOffset Robin 0 -8/playSound woodWhack/textAboveHead Robin "什麼..？"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/emote Linus 28/playMusic echos/speak Linus "我很感激你的善意...真的很...$s#$b#但...我以前告訴過你...我選擇以這種方式生活..."/pause 500/showFrame Linus 0/move Linus 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Linus "大多數時候我喜歡獨處...我喜歡天籟之音...隨著大自然的節奏起伏...#$b#這是讓我舒適的一種生活方式。我從未想過要改變這一點。"/showFrame Linus 0/pause 500/move Linus 0 -1 3/faceDirection Linus 3/showFrame Robin 0/pause 1000/speak Robin "我想我從來沒有這樣想過...$5"/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "@...我非常珍惜我們的友誼。而且我知道你也是。$h#$b#但...你不需要嘗試「幫助」我...我最清楚怎樣過自己的生活...好嗎？"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 60/speak Linus "...你聞到了嗎？這是成熟漿果的甜香味...$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 2000/end
content.linusWell: pause 100/friendship Linus 250/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Robin 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "謝謝，@。你讓我擔心了，...我以為你會邀請我和你一起搬去農場！*眨眼*#$b#你知道，我將你視作星露谷中最親密的朋友...你從來沒有試圖「修正」我...你尊重我的生活方式，即使你無法理解。$h#$b#我真的很感激。"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 32/speak Linus "啊...你能聞到嗎？這是成熟漿果的甜香味...$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 500/speak Robin "噢..多麼體貼...$h"/pause 1000/end
content.3091462/e 3911124/O Leah/w sunny/t 1130: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer 75 40 3 Leah 73 38 3 Marnie 70 39 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite leahPaintingSetup/animate farmer true true 100 80 80 80 80 81 81 81 81 80 80 80 80 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81 81/makeInvisible 68 36 13 7/animate Leah false true 100 48 49 48 49 48 49 48 49 48 48 48 48 48 48 48 48 48 49 48 49 48 48 48 48 48 48/viewport 72 39 true/pause 6000/emote Marnie 28/speak Marnie "唔……利亞？還要多久？$s#$b#……我的膝蓋在顫抖，我的大腿在哭泣，我的腳已經失去了知覺。 $s"/shake Marnie 500/pause 1000/shake Marnie 500/speak Leah "只要保持完全靜止就好，瑪妮……不要動！$h"/emote Marnie 28/speak Leah "嘿，@……你覺得我應該畫什麼風格？我什麼都行……"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #傳統鄉村肖像#多彩的復古流行藝術#極簡主義現代風(break)speak Leah "保持傳統風格是嗎？好的，我想瑪妮會喜歡的。"\addWorldState m_painting0(break)speak Leah "好主意！聽起來很有趣……讓我在調色板上再加一些黃色的顏料……"\addWorldState m_painting1(break)speak Leah "嗯……不是我通常的風格，但我可以試試。我最好換一個丙烯顏料……"\addWorldState m_painting2/pause 500/speak Leah "你的怎麼樣了？"/quickQuestion #完全就是傑作！#我還在盡力畫……#看起來像狗爬一樣(break)speak Leah "哇，我喜歡你的自信！$h#$b#誰說得准呢？也許你就是下一個盧皮尼呢！$h#$b#……我都等不及要看了。"(break)speak Leah "嘿，這就是我要的。如果你盡力去做，自然就會越來越擅長！"(break)speak Leah "嘿，沒關係的！萬事開頭難。而且你永遠都說不準，你的狗爬，對另一個人來說可能就是“現代藝術”。"/pause 500/textAboveHead Marnie "把我畫得漂亮一點！"/pause 1500/textAboveHead Leah "噓！"/pause 2300/speak Leah "好了，別忘了我教你的技巧……線條要粗，這樣握畫筆……"/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 2000/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 12/textAboveHead Leah "好了！"/pause 3000/faceDirection Leah 2 true/playSound coin/specificTemporarySprite leahHoldPainting/pause 1000/textAboveHead Leah "你看看如何？"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Marnie "哦哦哦！"/emote farmer 56/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite leahStopHoldingPainting/pause 1000/speak Marnie "我超喜歡！我要把它掛在我的房間裡……$h"/pause 500/speak Leah "好了，讓我們看看你的怎麼樣，@。"/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 444/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/move Leah 4 0 2/move Leah 0 1 3/pause 100/showFrame Leah 24/pause 1000/showFrame Leah 12/emote Leah 40/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "呃……這……很有趣！$6#$b#肯定是用了，呃……一種不同的方法……$6"/pause 500/emote Marnie 8/move Marnie 0 2 1/textAboveHead Marnie "讓我看看"/move Marnie 7 0 0/move Marnie 0 -1 3/pause 500/emote Marnie 8/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/playSound coin/showFrame farmer 57/specificTemporarySprite farmerHoldPainting/pause 500/showFrame Marnie 16/pause 50/jump Marnie/shake Marnie 3000/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 2000/speak Leah "瑪妮，你可以把兩幅都掛在你的房間！$h"/jump Marnie/pause 1500/speak Marnie "呃……@，要不你把自己的畫留下來吧？把自己的第一幅畫收藏起來，呃……很棒的……是吧？$s"/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize marniePainting/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Leah "嗯……親愛的？你原本打算把你畫的那幅畫掛在哪？$3"
